intro: Psychotria hymenodes, commonly known as the velvet leaf psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to tropical regions of Central and South America, particularly in humid lowland forests. The plant is characterized by its dark green, velvety leaves and small, fragrant white flowers that bloom in clusters. It produces small, fleshy berries that are typically red when mature. Psychotria hymenodes is often found in shaded, moist environments and is sometimes used in traditional medicine.
